title: Reposition owner photo to top-right of the website

requirements.summary: Reposition the OwnerPhoto floating widget from the bottom-right corner to the top-right corner of the viewport
acceptanceCriteria: The owner photo widget is visually positioned in the top-right corner of the viewport on all screen sizes.
The widget does not overlap or obscure the Navigation bar's interactive elements (links, cart/wishlist icons).
The circular photo, glow ring, and name label remain intact and fully visible.
The FloatingWhatsApp button in the bottom-right corner is unaffected.
The widget maintains correct z-index layering so it appears above page content.

file_operations.description: Update the fixed positioning classes from bottom-right (e.g., bottom-4 right-4) to top-right (e.g., top-4 right-4). Ensure the z-index is set appropriately (e.g., z-40 or z-50) so the widget appears above page content but does not conflict with the Navigation bar. Verify that the circular photo, glow ring animation, and owner name label remain visually intact and fully visible in the new top-right position. Test across desktop and mobile viewports to confirm the widget does not overlap the Navigation bar's interactive elements (links, cart/wishlist icons).
